body:
I can confirm, that there is something wrong when using Tabs.
I recently upgraded from v6 and all my forms using tabs stopped working.
When switching the tab, the input fields on the the activated tab, have the values from the prior open tab, it does not fill the values from the form data.
can you share a video on this one?
thanks @mbretter i was refer to the issue CSB. if you have an issue reproduce it so i can see what's in the code as well.
> https://codesandbox.io/s/sharp-cloud-48n07?file=/src/App.js there only a single input, and `watch` returns the correct result.

ok, the issue with watch was my misunderstanding.

This is a CSB with rhf6
https://codesandbox.io/s/thirsty-hooks-k0oo4?file=/src/App.js
When switching the tab it shows correctly the corresponding name.

When doing the same with rhf7, the "English" name remains on the "de" tab. If posting the form the value of the "de" field is English.
Just by switching the tabs, without changing the input field.

I have updated the CSB and added a submit button on both examples.

This is the same issue that just got merged when inputs get unmounted value gets retained. `shouldUnregiste`, the tabs are basically mixed with two forms but the same button for submit. If the original issue is the same then we can close it, as the next feature should resolve this by setting the config. `shouldUnregister`

@bluebill1049  Just to check are you awaiting further information from me regarding the original logged issue?  I can look at recording a video of the issue if you've not been able to recreate it in the sandbox.

> @bluebill1049 Just to check are you awaiting further information from me regarding the original logged issue? I can look at recording a video of the issue if you've not been able to recreate it in the sandbox.

i think your issue is the same @mbretter sharing the same form between tabs, and you expect the value to be removed while changing tabs. if you can confirm that, then i will close this issue. it's not a bug, but we will have a new feature to resolve htis.

Ah no, I expect the values to be there.  I expect that after I create a new tab, add two sub pages to the second tab.  Then swap to the first tab and then back to the second tab, I should see my two sub page controls straight away.  At the moment they only reappear when you add another subpage (re-render essentially).

> Ah no, I expect the values to be there. I expect that after I create a new tab, add two sub pages to the second tab. Then swap to the first tab and then back to the second tab, I should see my two sub page controls straight away. At the moment they only reappear when you add another subpage (re-render essentially).

please share a detailed video clip for the behaviour if you can, i couldn't reproduce the issue.

![NestedFieldArray](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2701844/115113022-0f85f680-9f80-11eb-9bc7-8c22dcf89ee5.gif)
Hope this helps!  Let me know if you require anything further.
